name: Drive (C:) Out Of Space ?
description: Its a game in which the player has to get through a maze to find the cleaner tool to clear his/her storage and proceed to next levels. This game is in alpha phase and doesnt have much levels but soon it will be in beta with more levels. It is currently available for Windows (64bit) for alpha. It will be availabe for android , ios , mac and linux for beta testing.
